name: you are a sailor
description:
A short story with choices . You are a sailor, and you travel the stars. Where will you go? What will you learn? Who will you meet?

Nothing too complicated or long or stressful, just something I did to get the hang of using Twine again.

Disclaimer: Whatever the sailor looks like in your mind's eye is exactly what the sailor looks like, to you. The doodle I made is just for funsies
